title: Teasing for Better Pleasing
itunes:title: Teasing for Better Pleasing
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Dr. Emily is talking about one of her favorite things – the art of the tease! Plus, she’s answering your sex & relationship questions.  She gives a lesson on teasing – what it means, why it’s hot, and ways to do it...
description:
On today’s show, Dr. Emily is talking about one of her favorite things – the art of the tease! Plus, she’s answering your sex & relationship questions. 

She gives a lesson on teasing – what it means, why it’s hot, and ways to do it up right, what to do when doggy-style is your partner’s go-to position, but it’s too detached for you, and whether or not you should tell your partner about your sexually fluid past. Happy New Year!


Follow Emily on all social @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
